summary: Implements a Home Assistant sensor platform that connects to the Foobot cloud service, retrieves indoor air‑quality measurements (temperature, humidity, CO₂, VOC, PM2.5, etc.) via asynchronous HTTP calls, and exposes each metric as a distinct sensor entity with proper units, icons and unique identifiers.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant users to monitor and react to indoor air quality conditions by integrating Foobot devices, supporting automation, alerts and dashboards based on real‑time sensor data.
